fields.name: Digital Recorder
fields.description: Mono Digital Voice Recorder with Built-In USB, 4 GB Memory, SD Memory Slot, 55 Hours Recording.

fields.name: Yamaha Electronic Keyboard
fields.description: The Yamaha 661 keyboard piano super kit includes an electronic keyboard with 61 full-size keys that provides you with a traditional piano feel whilst maintaining a portable and compact design that can be powered by either mains power (power supply included) or batteries.
fields.image_alt: A large Yamaha electric piano keyboard .

fields.name: Ricola Soothe and Clear Lozenges
fields.description: Ricola Soothe and Clear Honey Lemon and Echinacea Bag, Naturally Soothing Throat Lozenges, 75 g Pack of 12 Bags
fields.image_alt: Orange throat lozenges for singing lessons .

fields.name: Professional LPK25 MIDI Keyboard
fields.description: Professional LPK25 - Portable USB-powered MIDI Keyboard with 25 Velocity-Sensitive Keys with Synth Action for Laptops (Mac & PC), Editing Software Included.
fields.image_alt: A small electric piano keyboard for piano lessons .

fields.name: Digital Metronome - White & Silver
fields.description: Multi-function compact metronome. Enhanced display makes it easier to practice your rhythm and phrasing. Choose from two types of tempo steps: pendulum steps or full steps. Up to approximately 290 hours of continuous operation.
fields.image_alt: A metronome used to keep time in piano lessons .

fields.name: Shure Vocal Microphone
fields.description: Shure SM58-LCE Cardioid Dynamic Vocal Microphone with Pneumatic Shock Mount, Spherical Mesh Grille with Built-in Pop Filter, A25D Mic Clip, Storage Bag, 3-pin XLR Connector - (No Cable Included)
fields.image_alt: A microphone to use for singing lessons .

fields.name: Blank Sheet Music
fields.description: Blank Sheet Music, 12 stave staff paper, 100 pages, A4 8.5x11 inch Music Manuscript Paper Musicians Notebook for composing music & writing music notation
fields.image_alt: Plain white music sheets with music bars for songwriting courses .

fields.name: Windsor Music Stand
fields.description: Windsor 050151-BK Adjustable Folding Sheet Music Stand with Carry Case Black. Constructed of steel this music stand is made to be both portable music stand and comes with a travel bag to help you transport for performances or lessons.
fields.image_alt: A black metal stand used to hold music sheets for piano music .

fields.name: Music Theory: From Beginner to Expert
fields.description: Music Theory: From Beginner to Expert - The Ultimate Step-By-Step Guide to Understanding and Learning Music Theory Effortlessly: 1 (Essential Learning Tools for Musicians)
fields.image_alt: A book of music theory lessons .

fields.name: 30 Piano Sheet Music for Beginners
fields.description: Famous & Easy Pieces of Classical & Folk Music, Organized from the Easiest to the most Difficult!
fields.image_alt: A picture of piano sheet music for piano lessons .

fields.name: Sound Recording Equipment
fields.description: Audio Interface with DJ Mixer Sound Card, Portable Podcast Equipment Bundle XLR to 3.5mm Microphone Studio Board Voice Changer for youtube/tiktok PC/Phone Live Streaming/Recording/Gaming
fields.image_alt: A picture of sound recording equipment.

fields.name: I Love Music T-Shirt
fields.description: A fantastic pure cotton t-shirt available in multiple sizes. A must have for a music lover's wardrobe!
fields.image_alt: A grey t-shirt which states I Love Music.
